website_summaries.verdict: It's a bit pricey, but users say it's worth it not to waste time and expensive polishes with smudging. Dries in minutes –some reviewers say one minute.
pros: Uses cellulose and dimethicone to give nails a brilliant, high-shine finish
cons: Can't double as a basecoat since it doesn't adhere to bare nails

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad bottle?
customer_reviews.text: Took it to my salon for a professional manicure. It took 25 minutes to dry, just like any other top coat. I usually use Vinylux which takes only 9 minutes to dry to a very hard finish. The Lippman Addicted to Speed topcoat also left my nails soft/bendable, unlike the Vinylux which leaves them very hard and strong. For twenty bucks, I expected a lot more. (The Vinylux top coat is $8.)
customer_reviews.author: JKF

customer_reviews.title: They mean it when they say quick dry!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this stuff. I love it. I usually get my nails looking great and then they take so long to dry they get messed up. Not with this stuff. By the time you finish painting the first hand the first finger is dry. It's great. I use it as a top coat and it really does make my nail-polish look great for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Fast-Drying Top Coat
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny finish. Durable and dries super fast. Deborah Lippmann products are known for their quality. Apply to completely dry polish. Glides on easily. Make sure you seal your polish by bringing the top coat all the way to your cuticles and just beyond the nail tip. If you seal your polish it will last longer and it should not chip or fade easily. Do not apply to bare nails use over polish only. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and dries pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: ...not in one minute, like another reviewer mentioned. It's dried but you still need to be a little careful in 3-4 minutes, which is great. The top coat is very shiny/pretty. I'm in the kitchen cooking A LOT during the day, so I've got my hands in dish water quite a bit and I'm pretty rough on my manicures. But I am impressed that Deborah Lipmann's can take the beating I give it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally H.

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying polish
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I am always in a hurrying, it seems, and never more so as when I paint my fingernails. As long as you don't have too much polish on (like 3 or more coats), this should work great.
customer_reviews.author: KWarner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money if I could return it I would
customer_reviews.text: This top coat goes on great but it doesn't last one day, it I could return it I would! I guess I could donate it but would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nilsa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I had hoped this would be a good replacement for the Deborah Lippmann Umbrella clear nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped this would be a good replacement for the Deborah Lippmann Umbrella clear nail polish, but alas it is not. I've always had a hard time keeping polish on my fingernails and Umbrella worked. This nail polish starts pealing off my nails within 24 hours. My search continues.
customer_reviews.author: MM119

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a really good top coat that would dry quickly and I found it in this product. It does exactly what it says it will and I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: By far the best top coat I have ever used and worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: By far the best top coat I have ever used and worth the extra money! Once applied, it stays shiny and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would protect my nails longer than a day or two. Disappointed in the fact that it doesn't UNLESS I am doing some wrong?
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My favorite. Everything I wanted. Excellent service. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I won't have a mani/pedi without it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't do gel mani/pedis, but this top coat allows you to walk out within 5 minutes and not destroy your nails. It is the best super/quick dry that i have found.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H. Crews

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Found a few years ago and won’t be without it. Great shine
customer_reviews.author: Janet E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So, I've tried every fast drying top coat I could find. I didn't want to pay this price for nail polish. However, this is WELL worth it. I will never be without this again.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Love it! it has seriously reduced the nicks and dents to my manicure. Inever go without it
customer_reviews.author: S. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Fast
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST!! My wife use it when she is on a rush and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Go Wrong .....
customer_reviews.text: Another great product in this collection, dries quick, and your manicure will last longer than most .....
customer_reviews.author: ponceesmio

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dries my polish so quickly, about 1 minute & keeps my nails so shiny until I go back to nail salon in 2 weeks! Seems to make my nails stronger!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stagner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a top coat with brush as advertised. Instead I received a quick dry droplet applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to purchase bas d on price.  Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Dang this is great stuff. So happy I tried it. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: Buy me.
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to polish your nails, you might as well get this. You can polish, apply this, and go. Not all that waiting and then getting smudges. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This top coat is the best I've found yet. It dries fast, is thicker than others and wears alot longer than any I've tried. (Which are tons! !) It's also alot more shiny, which I love. It applies so smoothly it makes doing my nails a breeze, no streaking or bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: not as good as UV cured top coats
customer_reviews.text: use it with the the rest of the gel system. not as good as UV cured top coat. It 'peels' away from your nail, like peeling sticky tape of a surface. I'm sticking with UV cured gel at home system.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Howes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best quick dry! And does not peel off like most!
customer_reviews.author: GKS

customer_reviews.title: Great topcoat
customer_reviews.text: Great top coat. Polish stayson from 5-7 days. Did well when cleaning, too
customer_reviews.author: Judith Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Was only as good as OPI topcoat (which is much cheaper)
customer_reviews.text: Was only as good as OPI topcoat (which is much cheaper). Also it exploded when I flew with it (it was put in the hold)- so heads up to anyone in that regard- it was a MESS to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T.

customer_reviews.title: The best top coat on the market -- your nails are really dry fast!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for Amazon! Nordstrom's cannot keep this in stock so I am very happy to find it at Amazon. It truly is a wonderful product -- gives a shiny, hard top coat that dries in minutes! It was delivered fast, well packed and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E Deoudes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best fast nail drying polish when u don't have time 2wait! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Love it and will order regularly
customer_reviews.text: stuff really works speed drys nail polish in seconds! Love it and will order regularly...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon, Tampa Florida

customer_reviews.title: It's Fast, But...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's that great for more than 2 layers. I put on a base coat. Let that totally dry. Then I added 2 coats of O.P.I "Yoga-ta Get This Blue" and then one light layer of Wet n Wild Fast Dry "The Gold and the Beautiful" and this top coat dried fine until I attempted to move about 15 minutes later and the polish still got smeared. So, for one-two coats it is awesome but if you are layering it makes sense to make sure that you have time allotted to sit still and dry. Hence the 4 instead of 5 stars. I would still purchase this again, however.
customer_reviews.author: Imani

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work and leaves the nails tacky for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Book Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: not worth $$
customer_reviews.text: It did dry quickly however, it also dried quickly in the bottle. Half way through the bottle it became gooey.
customer_reviews.author: Pro shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing top coat
customer_reviews.text: This item lives up to the excellent comments I had heard about it. It has earned a "wow" from me😃!
customer_reviews.author: MaralynK

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Dries my nails quickly, has a great shine, and helps nail polish last longer than less expensive top coats. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The polish has lasted over two weeks easy with no signs of wear except the usual tip ...
customer_reviews.text: this speed dry top coat did, indeed, speedily dry the nail polish. The polish has lasted over two weeks easy with no signs of wear except the usual tip of nail wear but even that did not show signs until the second week. As far as some of the other reviews about a nice gel like shine.....NOT! My Sally Hansen Top Coat Mega Shine has done a much better job by far. Disappointed about that...but this product does exactly what it is intended to do and that is to speed dry polish. Pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Gage

customer_reviews.title: The Best Top Coat Nail Polish EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best top coat I've ever used. It dries thoroughly in less time than you'd believe and it stays shiny and clear for a very long time. I've worn it for up to two weeks with no discoloration or chipping. Note that I am VERY careful with my hands. I wear rubber gloves to do most any chores but even so, it's a terrific top coat.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: just kind of seems like they took an empty deborah lippman bottle and filled ...
customer_reviews.text: This didn't come in its original box and there was dried on polish all over the bottle. The bottle wasn't leaking or broken, just kind of seems like they took an empty deborah lippman bottle and filled it with whatever top coat they can find. The polish is not as thick as previous bottles I've used
customer_reviews.author: Sonia G

customer_reviews.title: Great top coat
customer_reviews.text: It does indeed dry fast and I love Deborah Lippman nail polish, it really lasts and holds better than other nail polishes out there. My only peeve about this particular top coat is it has a slightly funny smell. However, I do have a sensitive nose and the fact that it dries fast outweighs this. Plus as soon as it dries there's no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My super dark polishes will last a week
customer_reviews.text: I'd be willing to pay twice the price. Dries fast enough for me to put on at night, read in bed a few minutes, then go to sleep. No sheet prints when I wake up!!!! Keeps a high shine on my polish. I reapply every other day. My super dark polishes will last a week.
customer_reviews.author: regina C.

customer_reviews.title: Never spent $18 on polish before
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about expensive polish. This has converted me. I bought base, Naked polish cover a this-all form same maker. My manicures have never lasted as long. And this top coat--well, let's just say I don't have to wait for drying. I don't smudge at all.
customer_reviews.author: NYC  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great Top Coat.Dries fast and keeps a shine no matter what polish brand you decide to use under it.If you really want dry polish quickly this is worth the expenditure.
customer_reviews.author: I Shop 2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, super fast, super shiny
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as a top coat. it does not adhere to natural nails, but binds well to polish. the result is very shiny and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST fast drying top coat i've used in a long time! When they say "ultra quick" they're NOT lying! After your final coat of color, wait about a minute to give your color time to set. Then apply the quick dry & in 15 mins or less you are ready to go! I love how it dries your polish ALL the way through..hard & makes them super shiney! Totally worth the price..in my opinion, this is BETTER than Seche Vite!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shipper
customer_reviews.text: Great doing business with you! Will definitely shop with this merchant again. Everything was exactly as described, and it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Second Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. It's a bit pricy, but I really prefer it over other, cheaper top coats and it seems to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: HypnoCat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, I've been using it for years. dries very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Andie.C

product_meta.title: DEBORAH LIPPMANN Top Coat, Addicted To Speed, 0.5 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Super quick-drying top coat

BRAND STORY
Celebrity manicurist Deborah Lippmann, luxurious hand & foot care treatments. In 2018, Allure magazine awarded Deborah Lippmann winner of the best nail polish formula.
